title: Trackflow
description:
🚀 Stop drowning in complex analytics that invade your users' privacy!
Use Trackflow, a privacy-focused web analytics tool that connects traffic to revenue.
It's not:
❌ Complicated dashboards with useless metrics
❌ Cookie banners annoying your visitors
❌ Slow-loading scripts hurting your site speed
❌ Impossible-to-understand data

It is:
👉 Simple, intuitive dashboard with metrics that matter
👉 100% GDPR compliant with no cookies needed
👉 Direct revenue attribution to traffic sources
